Posts.Content: Nov 29, 2008 05:20AM kai1 wrote: An Australian swimwear designer, Irene Berzelli makes beautiful mastectomy one piece swimsuits. They can be ordered online at http://www.berzelliswimwear.com.au/ The fabrics are high quality and imported from France.  The direct link to the mastectomy range is http://www.berzelliswimwear.com.au/online-shop.php?category_id=12  Hope this helps, kai
